Using Ripe

Source: vignettes/ripe.Rmd
ripe.Rmd
library(ripe)

replicate


stats::runif(20)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=2,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.33363840 0.28485454 0.84900973 0.81212038 0.46011177 0.56254988
#>  [7] 0.28822029 0.69132220 0.56143112 0.45586942 0.12835045 0.09087015
#> [13] 0.81921225 0.29048465 0.69789575 0.41508901 0.85016339 0.38805200
#> [19] 0.43328252 0.71593761
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.5154710 0.8114395 0.3107919 0.1446088 0.4241699 0.1688204 0.4549511
#>  [8] 0.5074136 0.5210336 0.0249640 0.5886202 0.8331589 0.9830342 0.9047084
#> [15] 0.2867970 0.1325088 0.7614627 0.0460240 0.6801057 0.2298814

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=3,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#>  [1] 0.67215402 0.38056884 0.20346302 0.47501168 0.89706062 0.42569662
#>  [7] 0.11099996 0.67602608 0.76420083 0.04464437
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>  [1] 0.783822632 0.001394345 0.031391507 0.946616800 0.873283522 0.112287785
#>  [7] 0.192121853 0.060823967 0.389764381 0.973993232
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>  [1] 0.7708619 0.6404387 0.3380990 0.7503367 0.5873896 0.8643855 0.9889402
#>  [8] 0.5574298 0.3841938 0.2161480

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(replicate,n=4,simplify=FALSE)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.6069052 0.7172064 0.9395971 0.9751499 0.8702117
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.73697003 0.57269733 0.78862434 0.05662235 0.79527620
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.16399623 0.75199071 0.07511152 0.94702350 0.42321629
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.74012554 0.60317962 0.02069581 0.90986693 0.20641584

apply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(lapply, X=1:4)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.874740717 0.499036350 0.352331601 0.990851756 0.002994145
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.2078173 0.9441981 0.1076108 0.6905638 0.1930145
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.8705261 0.9871145 0.6638308 0.2824671 0.9667261
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.60438357 0.69649198 0.01637859 0.58932242 0.70634927

mclapply

stats::runif(20)%>%
  sample(10)%>%
  utils::head(5)%>%
  ripe(
    parallel::mclapply,
    X=1:4,
    mc.cores = 2)
#> [[1]]
#> [1] 0.4554711 0.6927890 0.1287765 0.2869886 0.1710148
#> 
#> [[2]]
#> [1] 0.6645880 0.6993757 0.3244528 0.1410085 0.3810978
#> 
#> [[3]]
#> [1] 0.80340735 0.14586970 0.08856758 0.63273843 0.35598310
#> 
#> [[4]]
#> [1] 0.2320562 0.8747500 0.5041841 0.9294061 0.7739664

purrr

iris %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(5) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          6.3         3.3          6.0         2.5  virginica
#> 2          4.7         3.2          1.6         0.2     setosa
#> 3          6.5         3.0          5.8         2.2  virginica
#> 4          6.6         2.9          4.6         1.3 versicolor
#> 5          5.8         4.0          1.2         0.2     setosa
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.7         2.8          6.7         2.0  virginica
#> 2          5.4         3.4          1.5         0.4     setosa
#> 3          6.1         2.8          4.7         1.2 versicolor
#> 4          5.9         3.2          4.8         1.8 versicolor
#> 5          5.2         4.1          1.5         0.1     setosa
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width Petal.Length Petal.Width    Species
#> 1          7.2         3.0          5.8         1.6  virginica
#> 2          7.7         2.8          6.7         2.0  virginica
#> 3          5.5         2.4          3.7         1.0 versicolor
#> 4          6.3         3.4          5.6         2.4  virginica
#> 5          5.6         2.9          3.6         1.3 versicolor

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2) %>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=1)
#> [[1]]
#>    Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1           4.9         3.0
#> 2           6.5         3.0
#> 3           6.5         3.0
#> 4           5.0         3.4
#> 5           7.2         3.0
#> 6           7.7         3.0
#> 7           5.6         2.7
#> 8           5.7         2.8
#> 9           4.9         3.6
#> 10          5.0         3.2
#> 11          6.0         2.7
#> 12          6.3         2.8
#> 13          5.0         3.3
#> 14          6.4         2.8
#> 15          6.6         2.9
#> 16          6.1         3.0
#> 17          5.1         3.8
#> 18          5.7         2.9
#> 19          6.3         3.3
#> 20          5.0         3.4

iris %>% 
  dplyr::select(1:2)%>% 
  dplyr::sample_n(20) %>% 
  dplyr::slice(1:5) %>%
  ripe(purrr::rerun,.n=3)
#> [[1]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          5.4         3.4
#> 2          6.2         2.9
#> 3          4.8         3.1
#> 4          6.9         3.1
#> 5          5.7         2.8
#> 
#> [[2]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.0         3.4
#> 2          5.0         3.0
#> 3          5.4         3.0
#> 4          7.0         3.2
#> 5          6.9         3.1
#> 
#> [[3]]
#>   Sepal.Length Sepal.Width
#> 1          6.7         3.3
#> 2          6.7         3.1
#> 3          5.1         3.8
#> 4          4.6         3.6
#> 5          5.0         3.6
